Review documentation and monitor product codes to search for discrepancies; troubleshoot quantity discrepancies between stock and records.
Develop and implement improvements to existing operational procedures or create new procedures in order to maximize efficiency and cut operations costs.
Review operations schedules and production requirements to ensure timely order fulfillment.
Oversee inventory and products orders according to company guidelines.
Track rates of accuracy, purchase and return as well as defective items to inform quality control decisions.
Perform critical inventory tasks to ensure the correct amount of items are in stock.
Prepare, generate, and file financial inventory reports and review reports monthly with management.
Work closely with Warehouse & Logistics, Finance and other related stakeholders to maintain accurate stock level at all times and propose sound inventory decisions.Skills
